underlying_goal: To refactor and restructure the main project documentation (CLAUDE.md) for better clarity and navigability.
primary_success: Successfully diagnosed issues with a large documentation file, proposed a tiered restructuring plan to improve clarity, and executed the plan, reducing the main file's length by 78% while preserving all information in a more organized structure.
brief_summary: The user initiated a task to optimize CLAUDE.md. Claude analyzed the file, identified problems with length and structure, and proposed a plan to restructure it into a smaller quick-reference guide with details moved to a new 'ai_docs/core/' directory. After approval, Claude executed the refactoring and committed the changes.
